list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of defending from or resisting attack.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she came to the defense of the eccentric professor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đến phòng thủ giáo sư lập dị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the case presented by or on behalf of the party being accused or sued in a lawsuit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the farmer's defense was that he intended only to wound the thief
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quốc phòng của nông dân là anh ta chỉ định làm vết thương kẻ trộm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sports) the action or role of defending one's goal against the opposition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã chơi phòng thủ rắn
